title: DIY Aquavit Recipe
full_text:
DIY Aquavit Recipe

Prep
5 mins

10 mins

72 hrs

72 hrs 5 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
vodka
1
sprig
fresh dill
One
(
2-inch
)
strip
of
lemon zest
, without pith (see note)
1/2
teaspoon
caraway seeds
1
pod
star anise
1/4
teaspoon
fennel seeds
Directions
Put vodka, dill, and lemon zest in a sealable glass jar. Seal and shake, then let steep at room temperature for one day. Remove and discard lemon zest and dill.
Add caraway seeds, star anise, and fennel seeds to the infused vodka. Let steep at room temperature for an additional 2 days. From here, taste the aquavit as it infuses. If you'd like a stronger flavor, continue to steep for up to 2 weeks. When desired flavor is achieved, strain through cheesecloth. Store at room temperature or in the refrigerator for up to 6 months.
Special Equipment
Fine-mesh strainer
, cheesecloth
Notes
Orange zest can be used in place of lemon, if desired.
